title: Prudential Norms on Capital Adequacy
description: Master Direction on minimum capital adequacy requirements for UCBs including CRAR computation, Tier 1/Tier 2 capital definitions, risk-weighted assets, and capital conservation buffer.

title: Income Recognition, Asset Classification & Provisioning
description: Master Direction on classification of advances into performing and non-performing categories, provisioning norms for NPAs, income recognition standards, and restructuring guidelines.

title: Know Your Customer Direction
description: Master Direction on customer identification, verification, ongoing due diligence, record keeping, and suspicious transaction reporting under Prevention of Money Laundering Act.

title: Priority Sector Lending — Targets & Classification
description: Master Direction on targets for priority sector lending including agriculture, micro enterprises, weaker sections, and education loans as applicable to UCBs.

title: Management of Advances
description: Master Direction on prudent credit management including exposure norms, single and group borrower limits, collateral valuation, loan policy, and credit monitoring.

title: Board of Directors — UCBs
description: Master Direction on board composition, fit and proper criteria, committee constitution, governance standards, related party transactions, and compliance culture for UCBs.

title: Fraud Risk Management
description: Master Direction on fraud risk management framework including fraud identification, reporting to RBI, investigation, staff accountability, and preventive measures.

title: Cyber Security Framework
description: Master Direction on cyber security framework for UCBs including IT governance, CISO appointment, incident reporting, business continuity, and security operations.

title: Interest Rate on Deposits & Advances
description: Master Direction on interest rate regulations for deposits and advances, including ALCO functioning, ALM framework, base rate computation, and deposit rate ceilings.

title: Investment Portfolio — Classification, Valuation & Operation
description: Master Direction on investment portfolio management including HTM/AFS/HFT classification, valuation norms, SLR maintenance, mark-to-market requirements, and dealing room operations.
